content: What is a list of 10 unique houseplants that require low maintenance, thrive in low-light environments, and only need minimal watering? Please provide the list in LaTex format.

Certainly! Here's a list of 10 unique houseplants that are low-maintenance, thrive in low-light conditions, and require minimal watering, formatted in LaTeX:

```latex
\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{enumitem}

\begin{document}

\section*{Low-Maintenance Houseplants for Low-Light Environments}

\begin{enumerate}[label=\arabic*.]
    \item \textbf{Sansevieria trifasciata} (Snake Plant)
    \item \textbf{Zamioculcas zamiifolia} (ZZ Plant)
    \item \textbf{Aspidistra elatior} (Cast Iron Plant)
    \item \textbf{Epipremnum aureum} (Pothos)
    \item \textbf{Aglaonema} (Chinese Evergreen)
    \item \textbf{Philodendron hederaceum} (Heartleaf Philodendron)
    \item \textbf{Spathiphyllum} (Peace Lily)
    \item \textbf{Chlorophytum comosum} (Spider Plant)
    \item \textbf{Dracaena trifasciata} (Mother-in-Law's Tongue)
    \item \textbf{Hedera helix} (English Ivy)
\end{enumerate}

\end{document}
```

These plants are well-suited for those looking to add greenery to their homes without the need for rigorous care routines.
